short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stop scrolling on LinkedIn and proceed directly to the relevant posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feedra is a Chrome extension designed to enhance your LinkedIn experience by filtering posts based on keywords or usernames. It helps you avoid endless scrolling by directing you to the most relevant posts and provides AI-generated summaries for quick insights.

Key Features :

↳ Keyword Filtering: Quickly find relevant posts by filtering your LinkedIn feed using specific keywords.

↳ AI Summaries: Navigate through filtered posts with AI-generated summaries that highlight key takeaways for concise information.

↳ Comment Suggestions: Get suggestions for thoughtful comments, enhancing your engagement.

Feedra simplifies your LinkedIn feed, keeping you informed and engaged with essential content.
